The new search engine Blekko calls its crawler ScoutJet, and links from 
its User-Agent to this URL:

http://www.scoutjet.com/

It nicely explains why they're crawling, how to exclude their crawler, 
and (at the bottom) how to contact them if there are problems, without 
other distracting/irrelevant info. I think it's a very good model.

You could call your crawler something like 'bibalex-bot' (rather than 
keeping the default 'heritrix' label), and link to a specific custom 
page on your site about your crawling with contact info.

- Gordon @ IA
